Text: Does anyone know where I can find english subs for this, I already have the movie.  N'importe qui savez ou je peux trouver des l'anglais subs pour ca?

I've searched for english subtitles too, but I haven't found any. There only subtitles I was able to find were dutch, so if someone needs it, u can find them here http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/3269955/dikkenek-nl
This is not really a movie where you can put subs in another language, you wouldn't understand the humor of it.

AC3 Sound.
Good if you have a 5.1 sound system ... 
Not good if you own a 2.1 or a simple stereo sound system.
